Con esta inversin comprara granos bsicos: diez quintales de arroz, diez quintales de azcar, cuatro de frijoles, gaseosas, elevar la compra de pollo y lcteos para lograr aumentar las ventas. y poder seguir sastifaciendo al cliente con sus productos.
texts.en:
Juan is 41 years old. He is an entrepreneur with a well-stocked grocery store, thanks to his intense efforts and the help of loans from Afodenic, which have been granted to him over a period of ten loan cycles. He was able to continue investing in his business thanks to his loans. When he began, he had very little capital, only what he had saved from selling fried food and his carpentry work, which was his profession years ago. His difficulties include power outages, since some of his products spoil quickly and this is a loss for him. He buys his products from wholesale suppliers so he can buy more cheaply and offer better prices to his customers. With this investment, he will buy basic foods, including ten quintals [100-pound sacks] of rice, ten quintals of sugar, four quintals of beans, and soft drinks. He will also buy more chicken and dairy products in order to increase his sales and continue satisfying his customers with his products.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buying a variety of merchandise to expand his inventory and increase his sales

loan.name: Nicolasa Carolina

texts.es:
Doa Nicolasa tiene la edad de 43 aos, pequea comerciante, se dedica a la venta de tortilla, desde hace varios aos, tiene 43 aos, vive junto con su familia. Inicio con poco dinero que dio su esposo, el cual para ella fue su inicio, que luego logro aumentar su produccin de venta. Con Afodenic ha trabajado por diez ciclos lo que ha logrado mejorar su vivienda, inversin en su tortillera que es su medio para lograr ingresos y lograr pagar sus gastos bsicos como necesidades personales.
Con este crdito har un muro el cual podr tener mejor seguridad de su casa como la higiene, con el crdito anterior ese era su destino pero no lo logro por que tuvo que cambiar el techo de su casa que le fue ms de necesidad. Ahora comprara: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro y comenzara hacer el muro, logrando as comenzar la obra y gozar de los beneficios a travs de los financiamientos.
texts.en:
Nicolasa is 43 years old and a small business owner. She has sold tortillas for several years. She lives with her family. She started with a little money that her husband gave her and that was the beginning for her and later she was able to increase her sales. She has worked with Afodenic for ten cycles and has been able to improve her home and invest in her tortilla business which is her source of income and how she pays for her personal expenses. With this loan she will build a wall which will give her house more security and sanitation. This was what the last loan was intended for, but she was unable to use it for that because she had to change the roof on her house as that was more urgent. No she will buy: stones, sand cement, and iron and she will start to build the wall. In this way, she will be able to start the project and enjoy the benefits through the financing.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: She will buy construction materials such as: stones, sand, cement, and iron to make the wall and have more security in her property.

loan.name: Laura Del Carmen

texts.es: La seora Laura 35 aos de edad, habitante del barrio la Fuente casada, su esposo trabaja como comerciante en venta de bisutera, mejorar por completo su casa est dentro de sus planes futuros. Mujer emprendedora, trabajadora con una amplia visin de superacin, tiene su propio negocio de ventas de cosmticos desde hace un ao lo inicio en su medio de trabajo ella empez a venderles a sus compaera de trabajo as aumento sus ingresos y las cantidades de producto obteniendo mayores pedidos logrando Mantenerse en el mercado. Hasta la fecha no ha tenido ninguna dificultad siendo de ventajas para el seguir creciendo en las ventas de sus productos. Sus planes en campo laboral es seguir expandindose colocar mejor sus bisuteras y obtener mayores ganancias. Con el prstamo que solicita invertir en compra de productos Avon como: cremas de cutis, perfume de dama, caballeros, vanidad, rubor, shampoo de bebe entre otros para mayores ventas. siendo la institucin de gran puerta en su inversin.
texts.en:
Laura is 35 years old and lives in the Fuente neighborhood. She is married and her husband sells costume jewelry. One of her future plans is to totally improve her house. She is and enterprising, hardworking woman with a strong vision of overcoming obstacles. She has had her own business selling cosmetics for a year. She started it through her job. She began selling to her co-workers and in this way she increased her income. She began to have a larger amount of product and obtained more orders and kept herself in the market. Thus far she has not had any difficulties and that has been an advantage to continue increasing sales of her products. Her work plans are to keep expanding, placing her jewelry stores in better locales and making greater earnings. With the loan that she is asking for, she will invest in purchasing Avon product such as: skin creams, women's perfume, men's cologne, blush, baby shampoo and other items in order to have more sales. The institution has been a wonderful door to her investment.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: She will buy Avon products such as: women's perfume, men's cologne, blush, baby shampoo, and other products that are big sellers so that she can diversify her small business.

loan.name: Josefina

texts.es: La seora Josefina es viuda y tiene una tienda de abarrotes llamada Abarrotes Martnez tiene ocho aos con la tienda, que se a permanecido con mucho esfuerzo ya que La seora Josefina se quedo viuda desde hace varios aos y vive sola. Ella quiere hacer crecer su negocio y tener mas ventas, requiere de este crdito para comprar mas mercanca como, abarrotes y comida enlatada para el negocio, refrescos y dulces. La seora Josefina quiere formarse un patrimonio para su vejez.
texts.en:
Josefina is a widow and has a grocery store called Abarrotes Martnez ["Martnez Groceries"]. She has operated this store for eight years, and she has kept it going through hard work. Josefina has been a widow for several years, and she lives alone. She would like to expand her business and increase her sales. She needs this loan to buy more merchandise such as canned foods, soft drinks, candy and other grocery items for her store. Josefina would like to save up a fund for her old age.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Investing in her business

loan.name: Miguel

texts.es: El seor Miguel trabaja como carnicero en un centro comercial de la localidad, y su esposa cuenta con un negocio de venta de carne. Entre los dos se ayudan para los gastos del hogar. El y su esposo quieren este crdito para los gastos de la escuela de sus hijos, como tiles escolares, zapatos y uniformes. Ellos les agradecen la gran ayuda que les dan. Ya que de verdad lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Miguel works as a butcher in a commercial center in his town. His wife has a business selling meat. Both help with the household expenses. He and his wife want this loan for school expenses for their children. They will buy things like school supplies, shoes, and uniforms. They are grateful for the great help given to them. They truly need it.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy school supplies

loan.name: Ignacio Alejandro

texts.es: El seor Ignacio trabaja de albail en una constructora, y se pasa ah la mayor parte del da, el piensa mucho en el futuro de sus hijos y quiere darles la mejor educacin posible, ya que ese ser el patrimonio para ellos mismos. El necesita de este crdito para pagar las colegiaturas de la universidad de su hija, as como uniformes y tiles escolares. El seor Ignacio y su esposa saben que es la mejor herencia que les pueden dejar a sus hijos, es una buena educacin para que no batallen el da de maana. El seor Ignacio no aparece en la fotografia ya que trabaja la mayor parte del dia.
texts.en:
Ignacio works as a bricklayer and he spends the major part of each day doing that work. He thinks a great deal about the future of his children and wishes to give them the best education possible, so that this will be their patrimony. Ignacio needs this loan to pay the registration fees at the university for his daughter, and to purchase uniforms and school supplies. Ignacio and his wife know that the best inheritance they can leave for their children is a good education, so they won't have to struggle daily in the future. Ignacio doesn't appear in the photograph because he works most of the day.

Translated from Spanish by Harold Sims, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: PAYING UNIVERSITY REGISTRATION FEES AND BUYING SCHOOL SUPPLIES FOR THE CHILDREN

loan.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: Oscar reside en el municipio EL Transito departamento de San Miguel, es casado vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de las edades de ocho y seis aos respectivamente, solo tres de ellos dependen de los ingreso que el obtiene del taller. El taller lo instal gracias a la ayuda de un amigo quien le enseo hacer el trabajo, hace trabajos en la casa y a domicilio trabaja de ocho de la maana a cinco de la tarde actualmente, el necesita el crdito para comprar materiales como hierro, pintura y herramientas, esto le permitir contar con los materiales necesarios para desempear mejor su trabajo, uno de los riesgos seria que el precio de los materiales suban. las aspiraciones de Oscar son ampliar su taller y as poder apoyar a su familia mejorando las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Oscar lives in the El Transito municipality in the San Miguel department. He is married, and he lives with his wife and their two children. The children are eight and six years old. All of them are dependent upon the income from his shop. He set up his shop thanks to help from a friend who taught him how to do the work. He works at home and at houses. He works from eight in the morning until five in the afternoon. He currently needs a loan to buy materials like iron, paint, and tools. This will allow him to have the materials he needs to do his work better. One of his risks is that the price of materials will rise. Oscars aspirations are to expand his shop and to be able to help his family have better living conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy materials like iron, paint, and tools

loan.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
La Seora Mara Esperanza C. es socia del banco comunal Divino nio Jess, vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca, que es la tercera ciudad ms importante del Ecuador, sta ciudad se caracteriza por conservar su estilo colonial en el centro de la ciudad.
Nuestra socia tiene 31 aos, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 15, 11, 8 y 6 aos de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y sus 3 ltimos hijos en la escuela, su esposo trabaja en su taller de carpintera, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Nuestra socia se dedica a trabajar en su restaurante el cual tiene hace 8 aos, labora de domingo a domingo desde las 7 a.m. hasta las 9 p.m., realiza una gran variedad de platos y el local en donde tiene su restaurante tambin es arrendado. Se encuentra en su segundo ciclo y ha ingresado a la banca comunal gracias a una prima quien le invit a formar parte de este gran grupo de mujeres luchadoras y trabajadoras, su crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de mariscos.
Su meta es algn da tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the Divino Nio Jess (Divine Child Jesus) Communal Bank and lives in the Miraflores section of the city of Cuenca, the 3rd most important city in Ecuador. The city is known for preserving the colonial style of its central area. Mara is 31 years old, married, and has 4 children, ages 15, 11, 8, and 6. Her oldest son studies in high school and her 3 other children are enrolled in primary school. Her husband works in his own carpenter shop. They don't have a house of their own and have to rent. Mara works in her own restaurant, as she has for 8 years, laboring Sunday to Sunday, from 7:00am until 9:00pm. She prepares a great variety of dishes, and the location where she has her restaurant is also rented. Mara is in her 2nd loan cycle with her communal bank, which she joined thanks to a cousin who invited her to become part of this grand group of struggling hard-working women. Mara's loan will be invested in buying seafood. Her goal is to have her own house some day.

Translated from Spanish by Harold Sims, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: BUYING FISH, SHRIMP, CONCH, AND SHELLFISH FOR HER RESTAURANT

loan.name: Maria Cruz

texts.es:
La Seora Mara Cruz G. es socia del banco comunal Divino nio Jess, vive en la comunidad de Paccha la misma que es reconocida por su hermosa naturalezal, su gente se dedica a la cra de animales y a la agricultura.
La Seora. Mara Cruz se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y aprovecha su tiempo para hacer lo que ms le gusta que es realizar sus manualidades, ella teje chompas, ponchos, gorras y todo su producto lo vende en su casa a sus amistades, esta labor aprendi gracias a una amiga y lleva 40 aos en esta actividad, tambin cra pollos, chanchos y los vende en su comunidad.
Nuestra socia tiene 69 aos, es casada y tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad que son casados y viven de manera independiente, tambin tiene una hija adoptada que la cri desde los 9 meses de edad pero ahora ya es casada y tambin vive de manera independiente, su esposo se encuentra enfermo debido que sufre de diabetes lo que le impide trabajar, pero con el trabajo conyugal y gracias al MIDUVI (Ministerio de Desarrollo Urbano y Vivienda) tienen su casa propia.
La Seora. Mara Cruz es nuestra socia hace 6 aos, los crditos le han servido mucho para su hogar y su negocio de animales, su nuevo crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de hilo para sus tejidos y tambin va a comprar pollos y alimento para sus animales, su meta el crecer ms en su negocio.
texts.en:
Mara Cruz G. is a member of the community bank "Jesus, Divine Child." She lives in the Paccha community, which is renowned for its natural beauty. Locals raise animals and work in agriculture. Mara Cruz works on household chores and takes advantage of her time to do what she likes most--handicrafts. She knits sweaters, ponchos, and hats, selling her wares from home to her friends. She has been knitting for forty years after being taught by a friend. She also raises chickens and pigs, which she sells to the local community. Mara Cruz is 69 years old. She is married and has three grown children who are married and live outside the home. She also has an adopted daughter she raised from 9 months of age, but she is also married and lives independently. Mara Cruz's husband is sick and suffers from diabetes, which prevents him from working. Thanks to Mara Cruz's work and the support of the Ministry of Urban Development and Housing, the couple has their own home. Mara Cruz has been a member of the community bank for 6 years. The loans have helped her in her home and her business raising animals. She will use her new loan to invest in the purchase of yarn to use in her knitting. She will also buy chicken and food for her animals. Her goal is to grow her business.

Translated from Spanish by Lydia Brantley, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buying thread, chicken, and food for animals

loan.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa tiene 52 aos, sus 3 hijos trabajan de manera independiente, por lo que siempre se ha preocupado por proporcionarle a su negocio los ingresos necesarios para mantener a sus clientes. Por lo que su actividad econmica es la venta de refresco y lea a pesar de ser una actividad muy humilde ella busca la manera de ganarse la vida, adems trabaja todos los das desde la 7 de la maana hasta las 9 de la noche. El crdito que solicita es para la compra de materia como azcar, bolsas, frutas y otros productos. Suea con mejorar cada da su actividad.
texts.en:
Tomasa is 52 years old. Her three children are on their own now and she concerns herself with being able to invest enough into her business to be able to satisfy her customers. She sells drinks and firewood. Aside from being a very humble activity, she searches for ways to earn a living, and works every day from 7:00 am to 9:00 pm. She is asking for this loan in order to buy sugar, bags, fruits, and other products. She dreams of improving her business each day.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Working capital

loan.name: Hilda Luciana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA; La socia vive en el distrito de San Jernimo en Chimpahuaylla la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Hilda; ella tiene 31 aos de edad y la socia es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con el comercio minorista, La socia vende comida en la plaza de Chimpahuaylla; La socia se levanta todos los das muy temprano a las 5 a.m; La socia prepara los diferentes platos en ollas y los platos de meriendas con cubiertos respectivos, toma a sus hijos y los alista les da el desayuno y los viste, luego los abriga y se pone al menor en la espalda con una manta y sale con sus ollas envueltas en mantas gruesas, lleva con ella los baldes para dentro llevar los servicios, la socia al termino de su venta retorna a casa para atender a sus hijos y descansar un poco. La socia solicita el prstamo para incrementar su capital y mejorar sus platos.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer y tener una mejor calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Hilda, 31, is a member of the SEOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA communal bank. She lives in San Jernimo en Chimpahuaylla district, Cusco province and department. Hilda lives with her life partner and has three children. Besides her household duties, she sells prepared food in Chimpahuayllas main square. She rises every day at 5am to prepare the various dishes in pots and plates with their respective cutlery. She prepares breakfast for her children and gets them ready. She bundles them up and ties the youngest one on her back with a blanket. She goes out with her meals wrapped in heavy blankets. She also carries two buckets in which she has the serving items. When she completes her sales, she returns home to tend to her children and rest a bit. She needs funding to buy ingredients to improve her dishes. Hilda values and is grateful for the loan granted because it makes it possible for her to grow and have a better quality of life. Similarly, she pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy ingredients to improve the meals she prepares.

loan.name: Vitelio

texts.es: Vitelio tiene 61 aos de edad reside en el Municipio de San Rafael de Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, vive con la compaera de vida y la hija, todos trabajan, el se dedica ala agricultura. El aprendi a trabajar la tierra muy joven, ya que los padres le inculcaron el cultivo de la tierra, no tiene horario de trabajo, el necesita un prstamo para comprar insumos agrcolas para cultivo de maz de una gran extensin de tierra, el comprar fertilizantes que son necesarios para darle mantenimiento al cultivo. Uno de los riesgos es que el clima no se favorable. La aspiraciones son convertirse en agricultor en grande y asi apoyar a a familia para darles un mejor sistema de vida.
texts.en:
Vitelio, age 61, lives in the San Rafael de Oriente municipality in the San Miguel department. He lives with his life partner and their daughter. All of them work in agriculture. He learned to work the land when he was very young. His parents initiated him in working the land. He does not have a work schedule. He needs a loan to buy agricultural supplies to plant corn on a large piece of land. He will buy fertilizers, which are needed to give his crops good maintenance. One of the risks is that the climate is not favorable. His aspiration is to become a farmer on a large scale. That way he will help give his family a better way of life.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy fertilizers, which are needed to give his crops good maintenance

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loan.name: Marleni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA; La socia vive en el distrito de San Jernimo en Chimpahuaylla la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Marleni; ella tiene 41 aos de edad y la socia es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos, su pareja la abandon hace 9 meses antes de que diera a luz a su ltimo hijo y desde entonces la socia es padre y madre de sus hijos, La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con su pequeo negocio, ella tiene una pequea tienda abarrotes, en la que vende casi de todo, aqu se puede encontrar desde artculos de librera, hasta plastiquera, La socia tambin distribuye cerveza, en esta su pequea tiene arreglo un pequeo espacio para utilizarlo de depsito para apilar las diferentes cajas de cerveza, ella vende hasta pasadas las 10 de la noche, en su barrio hay una discoteca y la gente suele salir a comprar del depsito de la socia para ahorrar unos centavos. La socia solicita el prstamo para incrementar su capital y comprar cervezas.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer y tener una mejor calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Marleni, 41, is a member of the SEOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA communal bank. She lives in San Jernimo district, Chimpahuaylla, Cusco province and department. She is a single mother of three children. Her husband abandoned her 9 months ago just before she gave birth to her youngest son. Since then, she has been both mother and father to her children. She alternates her household activities with a small grocery store where she sells a little bit of everything. One can find everything from stationery items to plastic items. She also sells beer. She has a small area set aside to stack the various beer cases. She is open until after 10pm. There is a discotheque in her neighborhood and patrons tend to come to her to buy in order to save a few cents. She needs funds to increase stock and buy beer. She values and is grateful for the loan granted because it allows her to grow and have a better quality of life. She pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy beer.

loan.name: Leobegilda

texts.es:
Leobegilda es una madre de familia de 56 aos de edad que vive junto a su hijo en una zona urbano marginal del distrito de Chepn, una zona agrcola de un considerable movimiento comercial, se encuentra ubicado en la provincia del mismo nombre, en la regin La Libertad, ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la regin Lambayeque.
Se dedica desde hace mas de cinco aos a la venta de pan en un pequeo puesto ambulante situada en la parte exterior de una de las galeras comerciales mas frecuentadas de la ciudad en donde vive, ella vende su mercadera por las tardes, debido al tiempo que lleva trabajando y al buen trato que ofrece a sus clientes, actualmente cuenta con una demanda estable y ella trata de mantenerla ofreciendo productos de calidad y un trato amable.
El negocio es una fuente importante de ingresos para la economa de su familia, y aunque su hijo ya trabaja, ella se vale de esta actividad para sentirse activa. Leobegilda desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas pan y dulces, de modo que pueda seguir satisfaciendo la demanda de sus clientes, por este motivo ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
Leobegilda es una mujer trabajadora, ella ha sacado adelante a su familia valindose de su negocio y ello la hace sentir orgullosa. Anteriormente ya ha trabajado con Nuestra Institucin y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en:
Leobegilda, 56, is a mother living with her son in a marginal urban area of Chepn district, an agricultural area with quite a bit of commercial activity, located in Chepn province, La Libertad region. It is an hour away from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque regions capital. For over five years she has sold bread from a movable cart located outside one of the busiest shopping centers in the city where she lives. She sells her wares during the afternoons. Because of the length of time shes been working and the good customer service she provides she has a stable base of regular customers which she does her best to keep satisfied with quality products and kind service. The business is an important source of family income. Although her son is already working, she avails herself of this activity in order to keep busy and feel useful. Leobegilda wants to expand her business buying more bread and candy so that she can continue to meet customer demand. This has led her to request a 1500 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to reach her goal. Leobegilda is a hard working woman. She has raised her family thanks to her business and this makes her feel proud. She has collaborated with Our Institution in the past and has shown herself to be punctual and responsible with respect to repayments.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy bread and candy.

loan.name: Elida Del Carmen

texts.es: Elida reside en el municipio de santa Elena departamento de Usulutn, est acompaada y vive con su hija de veintisis aos y un nieto de un ao de edad, todos trabajan y ella se dedica a la venta de pollos destazados. El negocio surgi por iniciativa propia no tiene horario de trabajo porque ella tiene su propia granja de pollos los cuales regularmente los vende cada seis semanas ya listos para el consumo, el se ha visto en la necesidad de adquirir el crdito para la compra de mas pollos y concentrado para los mismo, tambin invertir una cantidad para compra de ropa ya que tambin se dedica a la venta de ropa. Esto le permitir contar con los productos necesarios para satisfacer la demanda de los clientes, obtener ms ingresos y mejorar el nivel de vida de la familia. Las aspiraciones de elida son ampliar el negocio y convertirse en una distribuidora al mayoreo.
texts.en:
Elida resides in the municipality of Santa Elena, in the department of Usulutn. She has a partner, and lives with her 26-year old daughter and 1-year old grandson. All the adults in the family work; Elida has a butcher's shop that sells poultry. She began the business on her own and doesn't hold daily hours of operation because she has her own chicken farm. Every 6 weeks she has chickens ready for sale. Elida has realized she needs a loan to buy more chickens and chicken feed. She also has a business selling clothing and will invest in the purchase of more clothes. This loan will provide her with the products necessary to meet her customers' demands, so that she can earn more income and improve her family's living standards. Elida hopes to expand her business to become a wholesale poultry distributor.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase or chickens, chicken feed, and clothing.

loan.name: Rosaura

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA; La socia vive en el distrito de San Jernimo en Chimpahuaylla la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rosaura; ella tiene 37 aos de edad y la socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades con el comercio minorista; La socia prepara comidas en su casa y lleva a las obras a vender tipo refrigerios, ella tambin vende comidas los das sbados de forma ambulatoria en el mercado vino canchn; La socia se encarga de cubrir con sus ingresos la comida en su casa, ella tiene muchos sueos ver a su hijos crecer sanos y con buena educacin que estudien en la universidad y que logren tener una casa propia, sueos que con mucho esfuerzo la socia es optimista de que se harn realidad. La socia solicita el prstamo para incrementar su capital y comprar sus ingredientes para elaborar las comidas.
La socia valora y agradece el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer y tener una mejor calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the SEOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA community bank, and lives in the district of San Jernimo in Chimpahuaylla province, the department of Cusco. Her name is Rosaura; she is 37 years old, married, and has 2 children. Along with small retail business, she prepares snack food to sell at construction sites. She also sells street food on Saturdays in the Vino Canchn market. Rosaura has to feed her family with the income she earns from her work. She has many dreams: to see her children grow up healthy and receive good education, attend university and be able to afford their own houses. With hard work, Rosaura is optimistic that these dreams can become reality. The member is requesting this loan to increase her working capital to buy ingredients. Rosaura values and is grateful for the credit that allows her to grow and improve her quality of life. She is committed to repaying her loan according to schedule.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Increase working capital to buy ingredients for business preparing food.

loan.name: Nelson Francisco

texts.es: Nelson Francisco es un hombre casado y tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. Su econmica es una pulpera. Por lo que tiene ms de 7 aos que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que sus inicios se dan con muy pocos productos, pero con los financiamientos que han sido de ayuda para su negocio, por lo que no es la primera experiencia que ha tenido con crditos. Este financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de golosinas, granos bsicos, detergentes, huevos, leche entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Nelson Francisco is a married man and a father of 2 children. His business is a grocery store. He has been working in this business for more than 7 years. He started with very few products, but the financing has been very helpful to his business, and so this is not his first experience with loans. The loan that he is asking for to to buy candies, basic grains, detergents, eggs and milk, among other things.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Working capital

loan.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: Jos, reside en el municipio de concepcin Batres departamento de Usulutn, es casado vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos, tres de ellos ya estn acompaados y solo tiene un hijo en la casa que depende del, el tiene un negocio de venta de refrescos y boquitas. El negocio surgi por iniciativa propia su horario de trabajo es de 8 de la maana a 5 de la tarde actualmente una de sus dificultades es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder surtir su negocio, por lo cual est solicitando el crdito para compra de jugo, bebidas carbonatadas, productos para hacer refrescos naturales y boquitas. El crdito le ayudara a crecer mas en el negocio y podr contar con la mercadera necesaria para satisfacer la demanda de los clientes, uno de los riegos es que las deudas disminuyen o que los costos se eleven. Las aspiraciones de Jos es contar con un negocio grande que le permita generarle a su familia una mejor condicin de vida.
texts.en:
Jos lives in the town of Concepcin Batres, department of Usulutn. He is married and lives with his wife and four children. Three of them have already found mates and he only has one child at home who depends on him. He has a business selling beverages and snacks. The business began by his own initiative. His work schedule is from 8 in the morning until 5 in the afternoon. Right now one of his difficulties is that he does not have enough money to diversify his business. That is why he is asking for the loan to buy juice, carbonated beverages, products to make natural beverages, and snacks. The loan will help him to grow his business more and be able to have the merchandise necessary to satisfy the customers' demands. One of the dangers is that the credit will go down, or costs will go up. Jose's aspires to having a business big enough to provide his family with a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy juice, carbonated beverages and snacks

loan.name: Maximiliana

texts.es:
Maximiliana es una madre D. familia D. 50 aos D. edad que vive en el distrito D. Chepn, una zona agrcola D. considerable movimiento comercial, pertenece a la provincia del mismo nombre y se encuentra ubicada en la regin La Libertad, a una hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la regin Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega tienda instalada en su domicilio, el negocio funciona desD. hace seis aos, durante los cuales ella ha venido trabajando arduamente por salir adelante, actualmente cuenta con una clientela estable que siempre recurre a su negocio a adquirir los productos que ofrece. Con los ingresos que ella percibe D. esta actividad se encarga D. solventar los gastos D. su hogar.
Maximiliana desea adquirir mas productos D. modo que pueda ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ventas, para lograr su objetivo ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito D. 2000 nuevos soles.
Maximiliana es una mujer trabajadora y entregada a su familia, en la zona donD. vive sus vecinos y conocidos le consideran una mujer tranquila y responsable. Anteriormente ya ha tenido crditos con Nuestra Institucion y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento D. asumir sus pagos.
texts.en:
Maximiliana is a 50-year old mother who lives in the Chepn district. This is a farming zone and a busy traD. area. It belongs to the province of the same name and is located in the La Libertad region, one hour from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region. She sells convenience goods and groceries in a store located in her home. The business has been going for six years, during which time she has worked very hard to make ends meet. She currently has a steady client base of regulars who return to her business to buy the products she offers. With the income she receives from this work, she is able to cover the household running costs. Maximiliana would like to buy more products so that she can expand her business and increase sales. To achieve her goal, she thought it would be a good idea to request a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa. Maximiliana is a hard-working woman who is devoted to her family. Her neighbours and acquaintances say she is a quiet and responsible woman. She has already received loans from our organisation and has been punctual and responsible with regards to making her repayments.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Stansfield, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy groceries in order to expand her home-based grocery store.

loan.name: Futuro De Vida (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Futuro de Vida se encuentra formado por un grupo de 8 mujeres, quienes luchan da a da para ayudar a sus familias y con su trabajo diario lo estn logrando poco a poco, ellas esperan con los crditos crecer ms en sus negocios, viven en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es reconocida por los 4 ros que la baan, su centro histrico fue nombrado Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gastronoma y por su gente que es muy amable y cordial.
La Seora. Laura Victoria M. vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca, es su primer ciclo y su ahijada fue quien la invit a formar parte de este grupo de mujeres quienes luchan da a da por sus familias. Tiene 50 aos, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 21, 20, 19 y 13 aos de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive de manera independiente y sus tres ltimos hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad, su esposo trabaja en su taller de carpintera y con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia. Nuestra socia se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa en un mercado de la cuidad, cuenta con un puesto propio en el cual labora de 9 a.m. hasta las 6 p.m., trabaja de lunes a domingo sin descansar un solo da. Su crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para surtir un poco ms su mercadera,su meta es agrandar su puesto de ventas y surtir ms su negocio.
La Seora Silvia Yolanda L. vive por un hermoso sector de la ciudad como es el Paraso. Tiene 43 aos, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 25 y 22 aos de edad los cuales son casados y viven de manera independiente, su esposo es carpintero,con esta activida y con el trabajo de nuestra socia han logrado tener su casa propia. Doa Silvia Yolanda hace 6 meses tiene su tienda propia en donde labora de 6 a.m. hasta las 9 p.m. de domingo a domingo. Es su primer crdito y fue invitada por una amiga, su crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de vveres para surtir su tienda. Su meta es crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Futuro de Vida (Future of Life) Communal Bank is a group formed by eight women. They struggle day to day to help their families. With their daily work they are, little by little, accomplishing that. They hope that with the loans they will grow more in their businesses. They live in the city of Cuenca; which is known for its beautiful architecture, the four rivers that surround it, the historical center that was named Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad (Cultural Heritage of Humanity), its cuisine, and the warmth and friendliness of its people. Laura Victoria M. lives in the Miraflores sector of the city of Cuenca. This is her first cycle. Her Goddaughter was the one who invited her to be part of this group of women who struggle day to day for their families. She is 50 years old, married, and has four children. The children are 21, 20, 19, and 13 years old. Her first child is married and lives independently. Her last three children go to a school in their city. Her husband works in a carpentry shop. With the couples work they have managed to build their own house. She has her own vending stand, and she works there from 9 a.m. until 6 p.m. from Monday through Sunday without taking even one day off. She will use the loan to buy clothes to stock her merchandise a bit more. Her goal is to make her stand bigger and to stock her business more. Silvia Yolanda L. lives in a beautiful sector of the city of Paraso. She is 43 years old, married, and has two children. Her children are 25 and 22 years old, and they are married and live independently. Her husband is a carpenter. Through his activity and her work they have managed to have their own house. Silvia Yolanda has had her store for six months. She works there from 6 a.m. until 9 p.m. from Sunday to Sunday. This is her first loan. She was invited by a friend. The loan is to buy supplies to stock her store. Her goal is to grow in her business.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy pants, blouses, t-shirts/rice, sugar, oil, and eggs, etc.

loan.name: William Alonso

texts.es: William Alonso M. O. de 32 aos de edad, vive junto a su pequea familia la cual esta conformada por su esposa, la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, y junto a su hijo de 1 ao de edad, con quienes reside en Cojutepeque. William trabaja vendiendo zapatos, sandalias y tenis para hombres mujeres y nios, l es un hombre muy responsable y buen proveedor de su casa, el cual desea sobre todas las cosas sacar adelante a su familia y poder brindarles una vida mejor. Su negocio esta ubicado sobre la calle principal de Sensuntepeque ubicado en el departamento de Cuscatln, este es un lugar muy propicio para su venta ya que es una zona bastante congestionada en donde transitan muchas personas a pie como tambin carros y en el transporte pblico, es por esta razn que el mantiene una venta bastante estable, lo que lo incentiva a invertir en el negocio, es por esta razn que William solicita un prstamo para poder comprar mayor cantidad de zapatos, y de esta forma aumentar la variedad de estos como tallas, colore y estilos, esto le permitir ofrecerle mucha mejor calidad a sus clientes y tambin aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
William Alonso M. O., age 32, lives with his small family. His family is comprised of his wife, who devotes herself to the household chores, and their one year old son. They live in Cojutepeque. William works selling shoes, sandals, and tennis shoes for men, women, and children. He is a very responsible man, and he is a good provider for his household. Above everything else he wishes to get his family ahead and give them a better life. His business is located on the main street in Sensuntepeque in the Cuscatln department. This is a very propitious location for his sales. It is a pretty congested area where a lot of people on foot pass by as well as cars and public transportation. That is why he maintains steady sales. That motivates him to invest in his business. That is why William is requesting a loan to be able to buy a larger quantity of shoes. That way he will increase his variety of sizes, colors, and sizes. This will allow him to offer his customers much better quality, and it will also increase his income.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy shoes to sell

location.town: Cojutepeque en el departamento de Cuscatln

loan.name: Lucina

texts.es: Lucina R. D. V. 55 aos D. edad, resiD. en Municipio D. Cara Sucia, departamento D. Ahuachapn, vive junto a su esposo D. 64 aos D. edad, una hija y su pequea nieta a la cual cuida durante el da. Lucina posee una venta D. productos plsticos como: depsitos para guardar agua, comida, salsas, pimienta y azcar, depsitos para basura, platos, cucharas, tenedores y otros artculos ms, los cuales son muy utilices en las cocinas y en el hogar en general, su negocio se encuentra ubicado sobre la calle principal D. Cara Sucia en donD. posee ya muchos aos D. trabajar D. esta manera, por lo que es muy conocida en el lugar, as mismo Lucina es una seora muy respetada, la cual goza D. muy buenas referencias personas, debido a que es muy trabajadora, quien siempre ha deseado darle todo lo mejor a su familia. Lucina solicita un prstamo por medio del cual, pueda comprar mayor cantidad D. productos plsticos, ya que estos por ser tan necesarios en el hogar cuentan con muy buena demanda, as mismo desea poder solventar otros gastos personales y D. esta forma poder dedicarse mejor a su negocio invirtiendo todo lo que pueda en el, y as obtener lo mejor D. su trabajo.
texts.en:
Lucina R. D. V., age 55, lives in the Cara Sucia municipality in the Ahuachapn department. She lives with her 64 year old husband, her daughter, and her small granddaughter; who she takes care of during the day. Lucina sells plastic products like containers for water, food, salsa, pepper, and sugar. She also sells containers for trash, plates, spoons, forks, and other items. They are very useful in the kitchen and in the home. Her business is located on the main street in Cara Sucia, and she has worked this way for many years. That is why she is well known in the area. Also, Lucina is a much respected women who enjoys a good reputation. This is due to the fact that she is a very hard-worker who has always wanted to give all of the best to her family. Lucina is requesting a loan to be able to buy a larger quantity of plastic products. There is a very good demand because these products are so necessary in the home. She also wants to be able to pay for some personal expenses. That way she will be able to better devote herself to her business by investing in it as much as she can. That way she will get the best from her work.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy plastic products

loan.name: Omar Isidro

texts.es: Omar Isidro tiene 37 aos y tiene 2 hijos. Su actividad econmica es brindar el servicio de pintura. Hace ms de 12 aos, que inicio por su Papa ya que en algunas circunstancias le ayudaba y adems lo adquiri como medio de trabajo. Por lo que tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con fundacin, ya que los financiamientos han sido de gran ayuda. El crdito es para la compra de materia prima como pintura, brochas, diluyente entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Omar Isidro is 37 years old and has two children. He works as a painter and decorator. He started this work 12 years ago when he occasionally helped his father and then began to do it as a job. He has been working with Fundacin for a long time, as their loans have been a great help to him. The loan is to buy raw materials such as paint, paintbrushes, thinner and other items.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Stansfield, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: working capital

loan.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Bertha tiene 33 aos de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos, vive junto a su familia en el casero Los Palominos, una zona rural perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito agrcola caracterizado por dedicarse casi exclusivamente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son tratadas para ser exportadas a otros pases, la zona se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Piura, perteneciente a la regin del mismo nombre, situada a mas de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la regin Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega situada en la vivienda donde reside, all ella ofrece a sus clientes todo tipo de productos de consumo diario por cuya adquirisicin tendran que dirigirse hacia el mercado del pueblo, por este motivo su negocio siempre cuenta con un buen nivel de acogida. Esta actividad es una fuente importante de ingresos para sus familiares por lo que siempre se esfuerza por mantenerla.
Bertha desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas productos de modo que pueda aumentar sus ventas y percibir mayores ganancias, por ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 700 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su meta propuesta.
Bertha siempre ha trabajado por lograr el desarrollo y bienestar de su familia, su mayor anhelo es poder seguir trabajando para brindarle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera superior.
texts.en:
Bertha is 33 years old, married and has three children. She lives with her familiy in the hamlet of Los Palominos, a rural zone which belongs to the Tambogrande district. It is an agricultural district devoted almost exclusively to cultivating fruit which is processed for export to other countries. The zone is located in Piura province, in the region with the same name, located more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region. She sells basic goods and groceries from a convenience store located in her home. There, she offers her customers all kinds of everyday products for which they would otherwise have to go to the towns market, for this reason her business always has a good level of acceptance. This is an important source of income for her family and she always strives to maintain it. Bertha would like to grow her business by buying more products so that she can increase her sales and earn more. For this reason she is requesting, for the first time, a loan of 700 new soles from Edpyme Alternative to help her reach her goal. Bertha has always worked toward the development and well-being of her family. Her greatest desire is to continue working to give her children the opportunity to study for a career.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy products for her store.

loan.name: Luisa Emilia

texts.es: Luisa Emilia tiene 42 aos, su actividad es una pulpera, tiene 1 hijo a su cargo. Todos los das se le encuentra all desde las 6 de la maana hasta las 7 de la noche, por lo que siempre pasan clientes cerca de su negocio. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar huevos, leche, golosinas, granos bsicos y detergentes. La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Luisa Emilia is 42 years old. Her activity is a convenience store and she has 1 child to support. Every day she can be found at the store from 6 in the morning to 7 at night and customers always stop by. She is requesting a loan to buy eggs, milk, candy, basic grains and detergents. She appreciates and is extremely grateful for this loan, which will allow her to grow her business and improve her standard of living. She is also committed to meeting her repayment schedule on time.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Working capital.

loan.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: La Seora Maria Auxiliadora tiene 55 aos de edad, ella no pudo finalizar sus estudios. Tiene 2 hijos y trabajan de manera independiente, ella brinda los productos de venta de ropa y cosmticos tiene una excelente atencin con sus clientes, razn por la cual ella tiene en el negocio ms de 5 aos y poco a poco a construido su casita y educado a sus hijos. Ella solicita el prstamo para comprar mercadera y de este modo abastecer su negocio. Maria valora y agradece infinitamente el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Auxiliadora is 55 years old; she was unable to complete her education. She has 2 children and is self-employed. She offers clothing and cosmetics for sale and gives excellent service to her customers. For this reason she has been in business for more than 5 years and little by little has built her home and educated her children. She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise and be able to stock up her business. Maria appreciates and is extremely grateful for this loan, which will allow her to grow her business and improve her standard of living.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Working capital.

loan.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 42 aos de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos, vive en el casero Guaraguaos del distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito agrcola caracterizado por dedicarse casi exclusivamente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son tratadas para ser exportadas a otros pases, la zona se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Piura, perteneciente a la regin del mismo nombre, situada a mas de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la regin Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la crianza y comercializacin de animales menores, el suele criar ovejas en un corral situado cerca a su domicilio, cuando estas ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre frecuentan la zona en donde vive, eventualmente tambin la vende a sus vecinos. Adicionalmente se dedica a labores agrcolas con las que complementa los ingresos que necesita para sacar adelante a su familia.
Francisco desea mejorar la crianza de sus ovejas para poder captar mayores ingresos al momento de venderlas, para ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1200 nuevos soes que piensa invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado.
Francisco es un hombre trabajador y bastante entregado a su familia. En la zona donde vive sus vecinos y conocidos le consideran alguien honrado y confiable.
texts.en:
Francisco is 42 years old, married and has three children. He lives in the hamblt of Guaraguaos in Tambogrande district. This is an agricultural district devoted almost exclusively to cultivating fruit which is processed and exported to other countries. The zone is located in Piura province, in the region with the same name, located more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region. He raises and sells small livestock, generally raising sheep in a pen near his house. When they have reached a good level of development he offers them for sale to dealers who frequent the area where he lives and sometimes also sells to his neighbors. In addition, he does agricultural work to supplement the income he needs to support his family. Francisco would like to improve his sheep-raising so he can get more income when he sells them. For this reason he has requested, for the first time, a loan for 1200 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which he will invest in the purchase of balanced food. Francisco is a hard worker and very dedicated to his family. In his zone his neighbors and acquaintances see him as someone honest and reliable.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy feed for raising sheep.

loan.name: Mara Del Pilar

texts.es:
La Seora Mara de Pilar S. es socia del banco comunal Prosperidad, vive por el Sector de la Ciudadela Catlica en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad que es reconocida por los 4 ros que la baan, su centro histrico que fue nombrado Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gastronoma, y su gente amable y cordial hacen que esta ciudad sea nica.
Nuestra socia tiene 48 aos, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 26, 25, 23 y 11 aos de edad, sus dos primeras hijas son profesionales, la una es doctora en bioqumica y la otra es doctora en medicina general, su tercera hija estudia en la universidad y su ltimo hijo en el colegio, su esposo es empleado privado, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
La Seora Mara del Pilar es profesora en un colegio fiscal en donde dicta la materia de estudios sociales, es maestra hace 20 aos, tambin tiene un bazar ( tienda en general) hace 6 aos y ha iniciado este negocio con su primer crdito que realiz en la fundacin, es nuestra socia hace 6 aos y todos los crditos le han beneficiado tanto nivel personal como en su negocio, su nuevo crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de bisutera y su meta es ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Mara del Pilar S. is a member of the Prosperidad (Prosperity) communal bank. She lives in the Ciudadela Catlica section of the city of Cuenca. Cuenca is known for the 4 rivers that run nearby, and its historic city center has been named a World Heritage site. Its gastronomy and friendly and kind people make the city unique. She is 48 years old, married and has 4 children - 26, 25, 23 and 11 years old. The first two daughters are professionals - one is a doctor in biochemistry and the other a doctor of general medicine. Her third daughter goes to univeristy and the last son is in school. Her husband is an employee. They do not have their own home but rent the one they live in. Mara del Pilar teaches social studies at a public school. She has been a teacher for 20 years and also has had a general store for 6 years. She started this business with the first loan she received and has been a member for 6 years. All of her loans have been for personal use as well as for her business. This new loan will be invested in the purchase of jewelry and her goal is to expand her business.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase jewelry to sell in her store.

loan.name: Eveling Del Carmen

texts.es: Eveling del Carmen tiene 53 aos, su actividad econmica es la venta de cosmticos. Este no es el primer crdito que tiene con Fundacin, por lo que es una muy buena cliente. Hace ms de 9 aos que tiene este negocio, por lo que todos los das se levanta temprano para ofrecer sus diferentes productos. Solicita este financiamiento para la compra de lpiz labial, pintura de ua, pintura de labios, cremas y tratamientos. Suea con mejorar su condicin econmica.
texts.en:
Eveling del Carmen is 53 years old and her trade is the sale of cosmetics. This is not her first loan with Fundacin which makes her a very good customer. She has been in that business for nine years and every day she gets up early to offer her different products. She is asking for this loan to purchase lipstick, nail polish, creams, and other treatments. She aspires to improve her financial situation.

Translated from Spanish by Rocio Vargas, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase of working capital

loan.name: Alegres Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en el invernadero D. la seora Ana Isabel B. C. que es integrante del grupo Las Alegres que se rene en Tenancingo, Edo Mex. Y en la cual se ven los brotes D. las plantas D. nombre Alcatraz que ella cultiva. Ella se dedica a la siembra y venta D. flores pues es floricultora, este negocio lo inici hace ya 6 aos con la ayuda D. su marido y hoy la D. sus hijos manteniendose D. las ganancias D. este negocio. Su prstamo lo utilizar para invertir en el empaque D. su prxima cosecha, ya que segn comenta es lo ms importante por que D. esa manera se conservan en mejor estado y se mantienen con ms vida sus flores. Sus clientes opinan lo mismo, dicen que lo que buscan es un mejor empaque y ella es conocida en la venta D. las flores por su actitud al vender, es una comerciante agresiva debido al empeo que pone a sus ventas. Ella siempre muestra la alegra que la caracteriza esa es la verdadera razn del nombre del grupo Las Alegres. En la foto es la primera seora D. izquierda a derecha, D. camiseta blanca corta y pantaln azul. Tiene 28 aos y estudio solo hasta segundo D. primaria tiene 3 hijos ellos son Herendir R., D. 11 aos y esta en la primaria, Gabriel R. D. 7 aos y esta en 3ero D. primaria y Marco R. D. 6 aos y este ao entrara a la primaria, esta casada con Eustolio V. M. D. 42 aos el se dedica a la construccin D. estructuras para invernadero y para ellos el xito consiste en estar todos juntos como familia ayudndose. El grupo esta conformado por 10 integrantes que son: Ana Isabel B.C. Edn H. D. J. Lilia A. C. Mara Teresita M. H. Ftima G. W. Luz Mara E. G. Romelia H. E. Victoria B. M. Candelaria M. A. Ma. del Carmen W. M.
texts.en:
This photo was taken at the nursery of Mrs.Ana Isabel B. C., who is a member of the Las Alegres (Happy Women) group that meets in Tenancingo, Edo Mex. Also in the photo are shoots of the Alcatraz plants that she grows. She grows and sells flowers since she is a flower-grower. She began this business six years ago with the help of her husband and now with that of her children, supporting the family with the earnings from this business. She will use the loan to invest in packing materials for her next harvest, since she says that is the most important thing because in this way the flowers stay fresher and live longer. Her customers have the same opinion; they say they are looking for better packaging. She is well-known in flower sales for her attituD. about selling; she is an aggressive businesswoman because of the effort she puts into her sales. She always shows the happiness that characterizes her. This is the true reason for naming the group Las Alegres. In the photo, Ana Isabel is the first woman from left to right, wearing a short-sleeved white shirt and blue pants. She is 28 years old and studied only through the second year of elementary school. She has three children. They are Herendir R., who is 11 and in elementary school, Gabriel R. who is 7 and in the third year of elementary school, and Marco R. who is 6 and will begin elementary school this year. She is married to Eustolio V. M., who is 42. He works in greenhouse and nursery construction, and for them success lies in being all together as a family and helping each other. This group is maD. up of 10 members who are: Ana Isabel B.C. Edn H. D. J. Lilia A. C. Mara Teresita M. H. Ftima G. W. Luz Mara E. G. Romelia H. E. Victoria B. M. Candelaria M. A. Ma. del Carmen W. M.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Packaging for her next harvest

loan.name: Mara Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Seora Mara del Carmen G. es socia del banco comunal Prosperidad, vive por el Sector del Batan en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es reconocida por los 4 ros que la baan, su centro histrico que fue nombrado Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gastronoma, su gente amable y cordial hacen que esta ciudad sea muy bella.
La Seora Mara del Carmen se dedica a la venta de frutas actividad que la realiza recorriendo el mercado de la feria libre, lleva trabajando en esta actividad hace 40 aos, labora desde las 8 a.m. hasta las 7 p.m. vende todos los das de la semana.
La socia tiene 53 aos, es madre soltera y tiene 6 hijos de los cuales los 3 primeros son casados y vive de manera independiente y sus tres hijos son solteros se dedican a estudiar, con su trabajo ha logrado construir su casa propia.
Es su primer crdito y ha sido invitada por su hija a formar parte de este gran grupo de mujeres luchadoras que buscan mejorar el bienestar de sus familias, su crdito lo va a invertir en mejorar el techo de su casa y su meta es llegar a terminar totalmente su casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mara del Carmen G. is a member of the Prosperidad (Prosperity) communal bank. She lives in the Batan sector of the city of Cuenca, a city known for the four rivers that run through it, its historic center which was named a World Heritage Site, its cuisine, and its kind and friendly people which make this city very beautiful. Mara del Carmen sells fruit, a business which she carries out traveling through the Feria Libre market. She has been working in this business for 40 years; she works from 8 am until 7 pm every day of the week. This group member is 53 years old. She is a single mother and has six children. The first three are married and live on their own, and her three single children attend school. With her work she has managed to build her own house. This is her first loan, and she has been invited by her daughter to be part of this great group of determined women who seek to improve their families' lives. She will invest her loan in improving the roof of her house, and her goal is to totally finish her house.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Improve the roof of her house

loan.name: Vernica Janneth

texts.es:
La Seorita Vernica Janneth L. es socia del banco comunal Prosperidad, vive por el Sector de la Loma de Culca en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es reconocida por los 4 ros que la baan, su centro histrico que fue nombrado Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gastronoma, su gente amable y cordial hacen que esta ciudad sea nica.
La socia tiene 26 aos de edad es soltera pero se encuentra a pocos meses de contraer matrimonio, por ahora vive en casa de sus padres y ayuda en la economa de su hogar, sus padres tienen casa propia.
La Seorita Vernica Janneth se dedica a la venta de cosmticos de la marca Avon y Yanbal actividad que la realiza hace 4 aos, vende sus productos todos los das sin tener un horario fijo de trabajo.
Ha sido socia de ESPOIR desde hace 3 aos y fue su mam quien la invit a formar parte de este grupo de mujeres luchadoras, su nuevo crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de ms cosmticos ya que tiene pedidos que entregar.
Su meta es llegar a tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Miss Vernica Janneth L. is a member of the Prosperidad (Prosperity) communal bank. She lives in the Loma de Culca sector of the city of Cuenca, a city known for the four rivers that run through it, its historic center which was named a World Heritage Site, its cuisine, and its kind and friendly people which make this city unique. This member is 26 year old. She is single but will be married in a few months. For now she lives in her parents' house and helps with the household expenses. Her parents have their own house. Vernica Janneth sells Avon and Yanbal brand cosmetics. She has done this for four years and sells her products everyday without having a set schedule. She has been an ESPOIR client for three years, and it was her mother who invited her to become part of this group of determined women. She will invest her new loan in the purchase of more cosmetics, since she has orders to fill. Her goal is to have her own house.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy cosmetics, creams, perfumes, etc.

loan.name: Emerita Candida

texts.es: Emerita tiene 36 aos de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general, ella tiene algunas cosas en su vivienda y la mayor parte del tiempo ofrece sus productos ambulantes. Desde hace 2 aos, Emerita se alista temprano por las maanas para salir y mostrarles a sus clientes lo que tiene, ella los protege muy bien. Ella se encuentra muy contenta con este crdito, por lo que dar la oportunidad de comprar calzado, perfumes, cremas y ropa interior. As mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Emerita is 36 years old, and she sells general merchandise. She has some items at her house, but most of the time she sells her products in an itinerant way. For two years Emerita has been getting ready early in the morning in order to leave and show her customers her products. She protects them very well. She is very happy with this loan because it will give her the chance to buy footwear, perfume, creams, and underwear. She pledges to make her payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Working capital

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: She will use the funds to buy building materials and supplies that shell use to seal the walls of her house; and for personal expenses.

loan.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jos Manuel tiene 48 aos de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos, vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Chongoyape, una zona agrcola situada a una hora y treinta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.
Se dedica a trabajar vendiendo productos hechos en plstico en el mercado de la localidad donde vive, el realiza esta actividad desde hace diez aos y gracias a ella ha ayudado a su familia a salir adelante. Debido al tiempo que lleva trabajando y al buen trato que ofrece a sus clientes su negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida, esto lo motiva a esforzarse para poder mantenerse en el negocio.
Jos Manuel desea adquirir mas productos para poder aumentar su nivel de ventas y percibir mayores ingresos, para lograr su objetivo ha credo conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles.
Jos Manuel es una persona muy trabajadora y entregada a su familia, su mayor anhelo es darle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar algun tipo de carrera superior que les asegure un futuro prometedor.
texts.en:
Jos Manuel is 48 years old, married, and has two children. He lives with his children in the Chongoyape district. It is an agricultural area, which is one hour and thirty minutes from the city of Chiclayo. He sells plastic products in the market where he lives. He has been doing this for ten years. He has gotten his family ahead thanks to the help from the business. Due to the time he spends working and the good treatment he gives his customers his business is very well received. That is what motivates him to strive to be able to stay in the business. Jos Manuel wants to get more products to be able to increase his level of sales and get more income. To achieve this objective he is asking Edpyme Alternativa, for the first time, for a loan of 1,000 soles. Jos Manuel is a very hard-working person, and he is devoted to his family. His greatest desire is to be able to give his children the opportunity to study some type of professional career that will assure them a promising future.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy plastic products to expand his business

loan.name: Las Talentosas Group

texts.es:
Las TALENTOSAS est conformado por personas muy hbiles para realizar micronegocios en su comunidad Yanacoto, se inspiran para salir adelante Rmulo el presidente se dedica a la crianza D. abejas hace 20 aos, a raz que desD. nio vi a su to trabajando en ese negocio, entonces el decidi que D. granD. iba a ser lo mismo; cuando fue mayor compr un cajn para la casa D. las abejas que iba a criar y en un paseo que realiz la zona D. Matucana vio un panal D. abejas y se ingenio la idea D. capturarlas para as empezar con el propsito D. la elaboracin D. miel D. abeja, no fu facil pero cuando trabaj como jardinero, en la casa D. este seor donD. trabajaba, vi una revista D. cmo criar a estos animalitos y desD. ah aprendi hacer el negocio que desD. nio le gust.
El primer crdito que l recibi fue para comprar los implementos que necesitaba como tablillas para hacer la colmena, al principio no tena muchos clientes, con el tiempo se atrevi a vender a los mercados, tiendas, bodegas y as fueron aumentando sus ingresos lo que le ayudaron a mejorar su casita, educar a sus hijos, quienes ahora son profesionales,. El prstamo que requiere el seor es es para invertir en la compra D. ceras, tablillas para elaborar la colmena y mejorar la venta D. sus productos.
La Alcancia Comunal las Talentosas estan seguras D. permanecer en el programa para asi sacar adelante sus negocios y a su familia.
texts.en:
The "TALENTOSAS" group is formed by skillful people in order to run their microbusinesses in the Yanacoto community. They are inspired to move forward in life. Rmulo, the president, has been raising bees for 20 years as a result of seeing his uncle work in this business when he was a child, and then deciding that he was going to do the same thing. When he was older, he purchased a crate for the house in which he was going to raise the bees. On a trip he maD. to the Matucana region, he saw a bee honeycomb and learned the idea to capture the bees for the purpose of bee honey production. It was not easy, but when he was working as a gardener in the house of a man, he saw a magazine on how to raise these animals and ever since, he learned the business that he had always liked as a child. The first loan he received was to purchase the equipment he needed, such as the wood to make the beehive. At the beginning he did not have many customers, but after time, he dared to sell to the markets and stores. That way, his income started increasing, which helped him make improvements to his house and educate his children, who are now professionals. He is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of wax, wood to create the beehive, and improve the sale of his products. The "Talentosas" group is sure to remain in the program to move forward with their businesses and their families.

Translated from Spanish by Josh Wilcox, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase of wood to construct beehives

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: For home improvements and some personal expenses.

loan.name: Jonathan Lorenzo

texts.es:
Jonathan tiene 20 aos de edad, es soltero y vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Santa Rosa, un distrito cuya economa depende de la pesca, se encuentra ubicado a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.
Se dedica a la venta de pescado en el terminal pesquero que se encuentra situado en el distrito donde vive, el se levanta todos los dias muy temprano a comprar pescado a las cmaras que llegan a dejar el producto hidrobiolgico en el lugar para luego ofrecerlo en venta a los comerciantes que a su vez lo revendern en los mercados de toda la regin. Esta actividad le provee de algunos ingresos que utiliza en solventar sus gastos personales y apoyar econmicamente a su familia.
Jonathan desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas pescado, de modo que pueda incrementar sus ventas y mejorar sus ganancias, pero como no cuenta con dinero suficiente para realizar esta accin ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
Jonathan es un joven trabajador y responsable, su mayor anhelo es ayudar a su familia a obtener una mejor calidad de vida, el ya ha trabajado anteriormente con Nuestra Institucin y ha demostrado Puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Jonathan, 20, is single and lives with his family in Santa Rosa, a district whose economy depends on fishing. It is located half an hour away from the city of Chiclayo. He sells fish at the fishing terminal located where he lives. He rises very early every day to buy fish directly from the fishing boats that deliver sea food items to that place in order to offer it for sale to merchants that later resell it in all the regional markets. This activity provides him with some income that he uses to meet personal expenses and to help out his familys economy. Jonathan would like to expand his business buying more fish so that his sales will increase thereby leading to higher profits. However, he doesnt have enough money to do so. Therefore, he has called upon Edpyme Alternativa to ask for a 1500 new sol loan that will help him reach this objective. Jonathan is a hard-working, responsible young man. His greatest wish is to help his family attain a better quality of life. He has collaborated with Our Institution in the past and has demonstrated punctuality and responsibility with respect to his repayment obligations.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy fish.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: He will use the money to make some home improvements. He will rewire the home and build a wall.

loan.name: Jos Alberto

texts.es:
Jos Alberto vive en la ciudad del Cusco. Antiguamente la ciudad del Cusco fue la capital del Imperio Inca y una de las ciudades ms importantes del Virreinato del Per. La ciudad del Cusco se caracteriza por tener hermosos paisajes y sobre todo del valor histrico.
Jos Alberto fue jugador del equipo de futbol Cienciano del cusco, l defenda los colares de su equipo en la posicin de arquero. Actualmente, Jos Alberto es profesor de futbol en el colegio Ausangate que est ubicado en la urbanizacin Larapa de la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son 20 aos que se dedica a la enseanza del deporte rey.
Jos Alberto hace veinte aos atrs abri un restaurante en su domicilio, donde brindaba pensin como por ejemplo almuerzo y cena a sus clientes. Sus clientes le pagaban adelantado por los platos de comida. Por motivos de viaje Jos tuvo que cerrar el restaurante. Jos Alberto est casado y fruto de este matrimonio tienen cuatro hijos.
Decidido a empezar una nueva vida, Acomodo habitaciones de sus domicilios para alquilar y convertirlo en un hospedaje. Le pueden encontrar en su domicilio, que est equipado con regular necesidades bsicas, los 7 das de la semana, desde las 5 de la maana hasta bastante tarde en la noche. Jos Alberto desprende una imagen de amabilidad y alegra. Un flujo regular de clientes vistan su hospedaje y el negocio se anima durante los fines de semana o en las fiestas del Cusco. Jos Alberto tambin alquil su casa a la Asociacin Arariwa que est ubicado en la ciudad de Quillabamba.
Con su prximo prstamo, Jos Alberto espera recibir $500 USD. Por el momento, su hospedaje esta modestamente equipado de necesidades bsicas. Le gustara emplear el dinero de este prstamo para comprar una lavadora y un televisor.
Jos Alberto es un hombre emprendedor, responsable y puntual y por ese motivo sus amigos la invitaron a participar del banco comunal El Amanecer de la Asociacin Arariwa. El sueo del socio es abrir una escuela de futbol de menores en la ciudad de Quillabamba bien equipado y con proyeccin de mandar jugadores a liga Europea.
texts.en:
Jos Alberto lives in the city of Cusco. Formerly, the city of Cusco was the capital of the Inca Empire and one of the most important cities of the Per Viceregency. The city of Cusco is noted for its beautiful scenery but most of all for its historical value. Jos Alberto was a member of Cuscos Cienciano football team; he was a goalie. Currently, Jos Alberto teaches football at Ausangate school located in the Larapa area of Cusco. He has been teaching this king of sports for 20 years. Twenty years ago Jos Alberto opened an eatery in his home where he provided meals like breakfasts and lunch to his customers. His customers would pay for the service in advance. However, due to travel needs, Jos had to close his restaurant. Jos Alberto is married and has four children. Determined to start a new life, he converted rooms in his home into rental units and opened a boarding house. One can find him in his home, which is equipped to provide regular basic needs, seven days a week from 5am until quite late in the evening. Jos Alberto comes across as a kind, cheerful person. His boarding house has a regular stream of customers and on weekends or during Cuscos festivals it becomes quite animated. Jos Alberto also rented his house to Asociacin Arariwa located in the city of Quillabamba. Jos Alberto expects to receive $500 USD in his next loan. For the moment, his boarding house is modestly equipped with the basic things. Hed like to use this money to buy a washing machine and a television set. Jos Alberto is an enterprising, responsible and punctual man. For this reason, his friends invited him to participate in Asociacin Arariwas El Amanecer (Dawn) communal bank. His dream is to open a well equipped football school for youngsters in the city of Quillabamba in hopes of producing players for the European League.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy a washing machine and a television set.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Buy construction materials to build a bedroom in her house

loan.name: Edda Patricia

texts.es:
Edda vive en la ciudad del Cusco. Antiguamente la ciudad del Cusco fue la capital del Imperio Inca y fue una de las ciudades ms importantes del Virreinato del Per. La ciudad del Cusco se caracteriza por tener hermosos paisajes y sobre todo del valor histrico que tiene.
Edda hace un ao que se dedica a la elaboracin de tortas y mermeladas de forma eventual y vende a sus amigos, vecinos y familiares. Tambin se dedica a la enseanza y al cuidado de nios de 4 a 5 aos en un ONG.
Con su prximo prstamo, Edda espera recibir $400 USD. Por el momento, su negocio esta modestamente equipado de necesidades bsicas. Le gustara emplear el dinero de este prstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo mantequilla, leche y harina.
Su anhelo de Edda es abrir un local donde pueda vender sus productos y despus quiere tener una cadena de tiendas.
texts.en:
Edda lives in the city of Cusco. In the past, Cusco was the capital of the Inca Empire and one of the most important cities of the Per Viceregency. The city of Cusco is noted for its beautiful scenery but above all for its historical value. For the past year Edda has been occasionally making cakes and jellies that she sells to her friends, neighbors and relatives. She also works providing child care to four- and five-year-olds at an NGO. Edda expects to get $400 USD in her next loan. Her business currently only has the basics. Shed like to use the funds to buy ingredients like: butter, milk and flour. Eddas dream is to open a place where she can sell her products and later wants to have a chain of stores.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy ingredients like butter, milk and flour.

loan.name: Santisima Trinidad Group

texts.es:
Alcanca Comunal "SANTISIMA TRINIDAD"
La alcanca comunal "SANTISIMA TRINIDAD" tiene trabajando con EDAPROSPO-PROSPERIDAD por mas D. 2 aos y est formada por 8 socias, que viven en un mismo barrio, que con el pasar D. los aos han formado una muy buena amistad entre ellas, entre una D. ellas se encuentra la seora Celinda, quien es madre D. un hijo ya independiente, por lo que se dedica a trabajar en un fbrica, y a su vez a vender productos D. belleza que ofrece a todos sus conocidos, amigos y compaeros D. trabajo.
